title: AucklandPeaceAction
subtitle: Dear @JacindaArdern, Now that one Manus Island refugee has landed in Aotearoa without the sky falling in, its now time to call @JamesMarape to arrange transfer of all the Manus Island refugees. pic.twitter.com/c3RCnUJ2zc

title: Senator Papahatzhiharalambrous
subtitle:
Why is Australia forced to, whilst Gulf states like Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Oman & the UAE refuse to accept Syrian refugees? While Lebanon & Jordan, have taken in 1.5 million Syrians, the Gulf States have turned their backs on their Arab brothers.

Isn't it time we do too? pic.twitter.com/vmaJOLB1B3

title: Muzafar Ali
subtitle: Nothing is better than to be with amazing people generating positive vibes. Sheer joy to be in the community-style dinner to raise fund for #refugees. @jolyonhoff’s doco #TheStagingPost tells refugee resilience and inspires the audience yet again. @welcomingauspic.twitter.com/g2zXspBph5 – at The Welcome Centre

title: I’m your dad
subtitle:
And now Dr. Anna hood interviewing @BehrouzBoochani  and @golrizghahraman with astounding knowledge of how NZ & Aus differ in their refugee quota (were less per capita!) and the “great Hope” that was NZ for those in Manus.
“Sometimes (felt) close sometimes so far away” pic.twitter.com/5dBTBjvFrS

title: Mohammad Al-Khafaji
subtitle:
Congratulations @CeoRoumeliotis and @SSI_tweets for another wonderful Mosaic Gala Fundraiser.

Thank you for all you do to welcome refugees to their new home. pic.twitter.com/n8hTRFNQKP – at Sheraton Grand Sydney Hyde Park

title: Margherita Coppolino
subtitle: NEDA President and Policy Officer with #QueerrefugeeConference organisers and Lilith Raza from Queer Refugees Deutschland pic.twitter.com/P41BDBSjjJ – at The Sir Roland Wilson Building

title: Amnesty New Zealand
subtitle:
His first steps into Aotearoa  

The NZ Govt has stepped up & shown leadership by allowing @BehrouzBoochani to visit for the @WORDChCh event. Refugees are people who deserve a safe home and a life of freedom and dignity. 

Behrouz is a testament to the human will to survive  pic.twitter.com/GxQSKdRVFD

title: Amnesty New Zealand
subtitle: @amnestyOz ‘s Refugee Coordinator @drgrahamthom welcomes Behrouz to New Zealand pic.twitter.com/TfdeKdhG08

title: Shankar Kasynathan
subtitle: Farid was 16 when he got on a boat to Australia. For months he has walked our streets, talking to strangers about refugee sponsorship program so that others might come safely. Our neighbourhoods can & must build a new road to refuge. Stand with Farid. Stand with #MyNewNeighbourpic.twitter.com/6Foe74N9v2

title: Ruth McNair AM
subtitle: #QueerDisplacements  At first conference in Australia about LGBTIQ refugees and people seeking asylum.   Loved reference to Hannah Arendt -lack of nationality should not erase humanity or the right to speak and be heard pic.twitter.com/jlvaTLOR5S

title: Aydan Greatrick
subtitle:
Excellent and challenging opening panel on erasure and silencing of LGBTQI refugees. So much to think about ahead of the two day #QueerDisplacements conference in Canberra.

Thanks @TNDixson + @Renee_Dixson for organising - very excited for the next two days.pic.twitter.com/7OaBFSosfp

title: Martin O'Brien
subtitle: Winners!St Anthony’s take home Yr 5-6 Pairs gong @ #premierscodingchallenge. I mentored the Yr6 Ss on app design, UI & UX. One team member also from one of our Syrian refugee families - so proud of their grit & determination! #coding #educhat #AppleEDUchat #edtechpic.twitter.com/wQbx5Yu9TO – at Ferny Grove State High School

title: Dil Khosa
subtitle: This is amazing! The untapped talent of former refugees and I am just awe inspired always pic.twitter.com/aIJDrulVuD

title: Simon Rosenbaum
subtitle:
We got to meet Lynne Malcolm from @RadioNational’s All In The Mind and chat about our work in Bangladesh on sport, mental health and refugees.

subtitle: Medevac must stay. Australia must treat refugees and seekers of asylum better. pic.twitter.com/mPwttPpPzY

title: Dr. Carly Copolov
subtitle: Our first talk by Dr Adelman - @FulbrightPrgrm Scholar on cross-cultural communication at Blacktown hospital was a huge success! Thank you @imbutterworth @WestSydHealth #wslhdpic.twitter.com/zEb3Lbyy6p – at Blacktown Hospital
